full_compile_error:
Line 3: Char 25: neither size nor unit must be given for segments of type utf8/utf16/utf32
%    3|     SeparatorBinary = <<Separator:8/utf8>>,
%     |                         ^
code:
-spec split_words_by_separator(Words :: [unicode:unicode_binary()], Separator :: char()) -> [unicode:unicode_binary()].
split_words_by_separator(Words, Separator) ->
    SeparatorBinary = <<Separator:8/utf8>>,
    lists:append(lists:map(fun(Word) -> binary:split(Word, SeparatorBinary, [global, {trim, true}]) end, Words)).
